 /*========================================================================================
 Default ERP5 Web CSS.
 
 Guidelines (how-to create a good css):
 * All measurements should be expressed with scalable units like em, ex, %.
 * pt, px must be avoid expect for box borders (not sure) and tricks related to borders (like position popup of Edit Tabs)
 * Test your design and layout against font size increasing/decreasing.
 * Test your html code semantics value by disabling all your css.
 * Don't put styling directives in xhtml code.
 
 Tested Browser:
 * Firefox 1.5.0.6
 * Konqueror 3.4.2
 * Opera 9.01
 * Internet Explorer 6 (Layout: OK; Style: not OK)
 
 TODO: Layout is ok in ie6, now styling should be adapted to support ie6.
 ========================================================================================*/
 
 
 
 /*========================================================================================
 ** GENERAL STUFF
 **========================================================================================*/
 
 
 /* Good CSS directive to include in every website to reset all browser default style.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 * {
 padding: 0;
 margin: 0;
 }
 
 .clear {clear: both}
 
 img {border: 0}
 
 a:link, a:visited {text-decoration: none}
 a:active, a:hover {text-decoration: underline}
 a:link {color: #00248f}
 a:visited {color: #909}
 a:hover {color: #39f}
 
 a img, h3 img, button img, li img {vertical-align: middle}
 
 ul {list-style-position: inside}
 li {margin-left: 1em}
 
 .doNotDisplay {display: none}
 
 table {
 border-collapse: collapse;
 border-spacing: 0;
 }
 
 p {
 margin: .6em 0;
 text-align: justify;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Workflow states
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 span.draft {color: #be854d}
 span.published,
 span.validated {color: #078307}
 span.invalidated {color: #ab0303}
 span.cancelled {color: #ccc}
 
 
 
 /* Emulate <center> html tag.
 This class is called 'centered' to not interfer with the 'center' group
 used in erp5_xhtml_style rigid positionning mechanism.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 .centered {
 width: 100%;
 text-align: center;
 }
 
 *.centered * {
 margin-left: auto;
 margin-right: auto;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Default content styling (apply to everything, site wide);
 Typography & colors (fonts, color, background).
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 body {background: #e6e6e6 url(erp5-website-background.png) top left no-repeat}
 
 body, input, textarea, select, table {
 color: #333;
 font-family: Sans, Verdana, Tahoma, Georgia, Geneva, Arial, sans-serif;
 font-size: 8pt; /* XXX font-size should not be expressed in pt unit.
 ** This unit is quite convinient actually because it scale well
 ** in any browser on font resizing.
 */
 line-height: 1.5em; /* Let the content breathe ! This reduce the density of
 ** paragraph and make the text easier to read.
 */
 }
 
 .code, code {font-family: monospace}
 
 #transition_message, .warning, .error, .important {
 color: #f00;
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 h1 {margin: 1.3em 0}
 
 blockquote {
 margin: .5em;
 padding: .5em;
 border-left: 2px #ddd solid;
 background: #f9f9f9;
 }
 
 
 
 
 /*========================================================================================
 ** FORMs & INPUTs
 **========================================================================================*/
 
 /*
 Inspired by Aleksandar Vaci\xc4\x87's work,
 distributed under Creative Commons Paternity Licence:
 * http://www.aplus.co.yu/css/forms/?css=1
 * http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 input, textarea {
 border: 1px solid #999;
 padding: 1px;
 }
 
 input.button, input[type="submit"] {
 /* XXX Is this case happend in current web implementation ? */
 background: #fff url(erp5-website-button.png) bottom repeat-x;
 }
 
 input[type="image"] {
 border: 0;
 vertical-align: bottom;
 background-color: transparent;
 }
 
 button {
 margin: .8em .5em;
 padding: .3em;
 }
 
 /* Admin toolbox edit buttons have the same style as actions buttons */
 div.adminToolbox li > a,
 button {
 border: 1px #ddd solid;
 color: #999;
 background: #eee;
 cursor: pointer;
 display: block;
 }
 
 div.adminToolbox li > a:hover,
 button:hover {
 color: #333;
 background: #b0cfcb;
 border-color: #9abdb7;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Default Listbox styling
 ** TODO: change colors to have better integration in default erp5 web theme.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 .ListSummary table {display: none}
 
 .ListContent table {
 margin-bottom: 2em;
 width: 100%;
 }
 
 .ListContent td {
 padding: .1em;
 border: 1pt solid #adb9cc;
 vertical-align: top;
 }
 
 .ListContent td.Data {background-color: #adb9cc}
 .ListContent td.DataA {background-color: #fff}
 .ListContent td.DataB {background-color: #eee}
 
 
 
 /* Custom web Listbox styling.
 ** TODO: change colors to have better integration in default erp5 web theme.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 table.listbox,
 table.listbox tr,
 table.listbox td,
 table.listbox th {
 border: 0;
 color: #000;
 line-height: 1.5em;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 }
 
 table.listbox {
 margin-bottom: 3em;
 width: 100%;
 }
 
 table.listbox .right {float: right}
 table.listbox .left {float: left}
 
 table.listbox caption,
 div.searchResultHeader {
 border-top: 1px #3366CC solid;
 background-color: #c3e3df;
 padding: .2em;
 color: #000;
 }
 
 table.listbox caption em,
 div.searchResultHeader em {
 font-weight: bold;
 font-style: normal;
 }
 
 table.listbox thead th,
 table.listbox thead td {
 border-right: 1px #ccc solid;
 text-align: center;
 color: #666;
 background: #ddd;
 }
 
 table.listbox thead th:last-child,
 table.listbox thead td:last-child {
 border-right: none;
 }
 
 table.listbox thead th {
 text-transform: capitalize;
 font-variant: small-caps;
 }
 
 table.listbox tbody td.externalLink a,
 table.listbox tbody th.externalLink a {
 text-decoration: none;
 background: transparent url(erp5-website-external-link.png) center right no-repeat;
 padding-right: 15px;
 color: #637dc1;
 }
 
 table.listbox tbody td.externalLink a:hover,
 table.listbox tbody th.externalLink a:hover {
 text-decoration: underline;
 color: #637dc1;
 }
 
 table.listbox tbody td, table.listbox tbody th {border-top: 1px solid #ddd}
 
 table.listbox td, table.listbox th {
 text-align: left;
 padding: .2em .5em;
 }
 
 table.listbox tbody td a,
 table.listbox tbody td a:hover,
 table.listbox tbody td a:visited {color: #4343D9}
 
 table.listbox tbody tr:hover {background: #f6f6f6}
 
 table.listbox tbody span.number, tbody span.date {float: right}
 
 table.listbox tbody .mainLink {
 font-weight: bold;
 display: block;
 }
 
 table.listbox tfoot th, table.listbox tfoot td {border-top: 1px solid #999}
 
 table.listbox tfoot td {text-align: right}
 
 table.listbox tfoot .pageNavigation button {
 border: 1px #eee solid;
 background: #fff;
 padding: .2em .4em;
 margin: 0 .1em;
 }
 
 table.listbox tfoot .pageNavigation button:hover {
 border: 1px #999 solid;
 text-decoration: none;
 background: #eee;
 }
 
 
 
 
 /*========================================================================================
 ** WEB WIDGET
 **========================================================================================*/
 
 /* Default layout and style of form web widgets.
 All widgets (extracted from layout form) are always inside a wrapper.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.wrapper div.field {
 background: #fff url(erp5-website-field.png) top repeat-x;
 border: 1px solid #ccc;
 color: #666;
 margin: .3em;
 padding: .5em;
 }
 
 div.wrapper div.field label {font-weight: bold}
 
 
 
 /* Admin toolbox widget style.
 Some properties override default web widget style,
 that's why there is "div.wrapper" in some CSS selectors.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.wrapper div.adminToolbox {
 position: fixed;
 z-index: 200;
 top: 2px;
 right: 2px;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 background-color: #fff7cd;
 border: 1px solid #f77;
 }
 
 div.adminToolbox label {display: none}
 
 /* Sub section title */
 div.adminToolbox h3 {
 padding: .5em 0;
 margin-left: -1em;
 font-size: inherit;
 }
 
 /* Title */
 div.adminToolbox > div > h3 {
 background: #f77;
 padding: .5em;
 margin: 0;
 color: #fff;
 cursor: pointer;
 }
 
 div.adminToolbox > div > h3:hover {background: #f00}
 
 div.adminToolbox > div.input > div.adminSection {
 border-bottom: 1px dotted #f77;
 padding: .5em .5em 1em 1.5em;
 }
 
 div.adminToolbox > div.input > div.adminSection:last-child {border-bottom: none}
 
 div.adminToolbox ul {list-style: none}
 
 div.adminToolbox li {margin: 0}
 
 div.adminToolbox li > a {text-decoration: none}
 
 div.adminToolbox button,
 div.adminToolbox li > a {
 margin: .1em 0;
 padding: .2em;
 }
 
 div.adminToolbox button[type="submit"] {display: none}
 
 
 
 /* Reset default styling of fields in admin tool box
 ** TODO: find a CSS trick to let forms and fieldset embedded in
 ** ".adminToolbox" behave like default one instead of using
 ** the one defined by default "div.wrapper div.field" rules.
 */
 div.adminToolbox fieldset { /* Should be the same as "fieldset" rule */
 border: inherit;
 margin: 0;
 }
 div.adminToolbox fieldset > div.field { /* Should be similar to "fieldset > div" rule */
 padding: 0;
 margin: .1em 0;
 background: none;
 border: none;
 }
 div.adminToolbox div.field label { /* Should be the same as "fieldset label" rule */
 display: inherit;
 font-weight: inherit;
 margin: .1em 0;
 }
 
 /* Those values differ from default "fieldset label" rule to reduce admin toolbox minimum width */
 div.adminToolbox div.field label {width: 5em}
 div.adminToolbox div.field div.input {margin-left: 5.5em}
 
 
 
 /* Breadcrumb default style
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.breadcrumb li a.selected {border-bottom: 1px dashed #999}
 
 
 
 
 /*========================================================================================
 ** PAGE LAYOUT
 **========================================================================================*/
 
 /* Content zone form styling (apply for editable mode and read
 only mode within the content zone).
 TODO: Change form rendering to let the field go below the label
 if there is not enought width to display them inline.
 TODO: Use dtml variables to define dynamiccaly label width.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 fieldset {
 margin: 1em 0;
 padding: .5em;
 border-color: #ccc;
 border-width: 1px 0 0;
 border-style: dotted none none;
 }
 
 fieldset > div {
 clear: both;
 margin: .1em 0;
 position: relative;
 }
 
 fieldset div.input {
 margin-left: 11.5em; /* = div.content label width + 0.5 of margin */
 }
 
 fieldset legend {
 padding: .2em .5em;
 font-weight: bold;
 color: #666;
 text-transform: capitalize;
 }
 
 fieldset label {
 margin: 0;
 display: block;
 width: 11em;
 text-align: right;
 float: left;
 text-transform: capitalize;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Edit tabs styling.
 ** Edit tabs are another part of admin stuffs and
 ** should respect other admin design convention
 ** (colors, etc...) to keep the UI consistent.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.actions {
 position: relative;
 width: 100%;
 height: 3em;
 }
 
 div.actions ul {
 position: absolute;
 bottom: -1px;
 list-style: none;
 margin: 0;
 }
 
 div.actions ul li {
 display: inline;
 margin: 0;
 padding: 0;
 }
 
 div.actions ul a,
 div.actions ul li.selected a {
 display: block;
 float: left;
 padding: 4px 1em;
 margin: 1px 2px 0 0;
 text-align: center;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 
 div.actions ul a {
 background: #fffae1;
 border: 1px solid #999;
 }
 
 div.actions ul li.selected a,
 div.actions ul li.selected a:hover {
 border-bottom: none;
 padding-bottom: 6px;
 margin-top: 0;
 background: #fff;
 }
 
 div.actions ul a:hover {
 margin-top: 0;
 border-color: #000;
 border-bottom: none;
 padding-bottom: 5px;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Editable mode forms styling
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.document > div.editable {border: 1px solid #999}
 
 /* Save button styling */
 div.actions button {
 position: absolute; /* XXX bad location: should be at the bottom of the form */
 z-index: 300;
 top: -.5em;
 right: 0;
 }
 
 /* Reset common fieldset styling for bottom group in editable mode:
 - no need to let some free space in the left side
 - no need to display label
 - no need to display fieldset legend
 TODO: Because thoses properties are used for generic ".bottom" fieldset
 and webcontent custom forms, we can add a new CSS class with a better
 name to enhance semantics.
 */
 div.content fieldset.bottom legend,
 div.content fieldset.bottom label {
 display: none;
 }
 
 div.content fieldset.bottom div.input {margin-left: inherit}
 
 
 
 /* Special rendering for read-only webcontent
 (used in WebPage_viewAsWeb and so on).
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.content > fieldset.webcontent {
 margin: 0;
 border: 0;
 }
 
 /* TODO: redo webcontent header spacing policy because lack of consistency
 (not tested with huge titles) */
 
 div.content > fieldset#fieldset_webcontent {padding: 2em}
 
 div.content > fieldset.header {
 padding-bottom: 1em;
 border-bottom: .3em solid #999;
 }
 
 div.content > fieldset.webcontent span.headline {
 display: block;
 margin: 1em 0;
 padding: 0 1em;
 font-size: 200%;
 color: #999;
 font-weight: bold;
 text-shadow: .1em .1em .1em #eee;
 }
 
 div.content > fieldset.webcontent span.summary {
 display: block;
 font-size: 120%;
 padding: 0 2em;
 font-style: italic;
 }
 
 
 
 /* Login page style
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.content.login {padding: 0 1em}
 div.content.login fieldset {border: none}
 
 
 
 /* Extra content (metadata, related document box, etc...) styling.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
 
 div.content fieldset.webcontent.bottom div {display: inline}
 
 div.content fieldset.webcontent.extra {
 color: #999;
 background-color: #f9f9f9;
 border: 1px solid #eee;
 border-right: none;
 margin: 1em 0 1em 1em;
 width: 20em; /* XXX CONSTANT !! */
 float: right;
 clear: right;
 display: inline;
 }
 
 div.content fieldset.webcontent.extra legend {color: #999}
 div.content fieldset.webcontent.extra label:after {content: ":"}
